features.title: Facilitator Hub (/facilitator)
features.description: The Facilitator Hub is the entry point to adult tools. It shows quick links to Account, Learners, Lessons, Calendar, and Mr. Mentor.
features.howToUse: Use the cards to open a section (Account/Learners/Lessons/Calendar). Use the Mr. Mentor button to open the facilitator chat experience.

features.title: Account (/facilitator/account)
features.description: The Account page is the central place to manage facilitator profile and security settings, connections, hotkeys, timezone, and billing links.
features.howToUse: Open a card to edit: Your Name; Email and Password; Two-Factor Auth; Facilitator PIN; Connected Accounts; Hotkeys; Timezone; Marketing Emails; Policies; Plan; Danger Zone. Notifications is also linked from here.

features.title: Account Settings (Redirect) (/facilitator/account/settings)
features.description: This route redirects to the unified Account page.
features.howToUse: If you land here, you’ll be sent to /facilitator/account automatically.

features.title: Plan & Billing (/facilitator/account/plan)
features.description: The Plan page compares tiers and lets you start a trial, start checkout for a paid tier, or open subscription management.
features.howToUse: Pick a column and select a plan. Use “Manage subscription” to open the in-app billing management flow.

features.title: Lesson Calendar (/facilitator/calendar)
features.description: The Lesson Calendar is the main scheduling interface. You select a learner, view scheduled lessons by date, and (if your plan allows) schedule, reschedule, remove, and plan lessons.
features.howToUse: Select a learner first. Use the calendar to pick a date and review scheduled items. Use scheduling/rescheduling controls to move lessons. Use the Planner tab (when available) to generate longer-term plans. You can also open per-lesson tools like notes, visual aids, and portfolio-related modals from calendar actions.

features.title: Learners (/facilitator/learners)
features.description: The Learners page lists all learners under your account and lets you select the active learner and edit learner-specific settings.
features.howToUse: Select a learner to set the current learner context (mirrors the Learn side). Use edit actions/overlays to update basic info (name/grade), learning targets, AI-related toggles, and timer settings. Use delete to remove a learner. Use Add Learner to create a new learner, and Transcripts to view a learner’s transcript PDFs.

features.title: Add Learner (/facilitator/learners/add)
features.description: This page creates a new learner profile with name, grade, humor level, and per-phase targets.
features.howToUse: Fill out Name and choose Grade. Optionally adjust Humor Level and the Comprehension/Exercise/Worksheet/Test targets. Save to create the learner, or Cancel to return.

features.title: Learner Transcripts (/facilitator/learners/[id]/transcripts)
features.description: This page lists transcript PDFs for a specific learner and provides Open/Download actions.
features.howToUse: Open a transcript to view it in a new tab, or Download to save it locally. Use Back to Learners to return.

features.title: Lesson Library (/facilitator/lessons)
features.description: The Lesson Library is where facilitators browse lessons, make them available to a learner, and optionally schedule them for specific dates.
features.howToUse: Select a learner, then use Search + Subject/Grade filters and the Owned/Downloadable/All scope. Click Load Lessons to fetch the list. Mark lessons Available to show them to the learner, and use scheduling controls to assign lessons to a calendar date. Use New Lesson to create from scratch or Generate Lesson to open Lesson Maker.

features.title: Lesson Editor (/facilitator/lessons/edit)
features.description: The Lesson Editor lets you create a new lesson or edit an existing one, including content, questions, and visual aids. It also includes facilitator actions like notes, assigning, scheduling, and delete.
features.howToUse: Open with `new=1` to create a blank lesson, or pass a `key` to edit an existing lesson. Use Save to persist and return to Lessons. Use the Visual Aids tools to load/generate and manage images. Use the Notes/Schedule/Assign flows to apply learner-specific actions.

features.title: Lesson Maker (/facilitator/generator)
features.description: Lesson Maker generates a new lesson from a structured form (grade, difficulty, subject, title, description, notes, vocabulary) and then links you into the Lesson Editor.
features.howToUse: Fill in Grade/Subject/Difficulty and a Title, then optionally add Description/Teaching Notes/Vocabulary. Use AI Rewrite buttons to rewrite individual fields. Click Generate Lesson, then use Edit This Lesson to open the Lesson Editor, or go Back to Lessons.

features.title: Counselor (Redirect) (/facilitator/generator/counselor)
features.description: This route redirects to the Mr. Mentor page.
features.howToUse: If you navigate here, you’ll be redirected to /facilitator/mr-mentor.

features.title: Lesson Maker (Redirect) (/facilitator/generator/lesson-maker)
features.description: This route redirects to the main Lesson Maker page.
features.howToUse: If you land here, you’ll be sent to /facilitator/generator.

features.title: Generated Lessons (Redirect) (/facilitator/generator/generated)
features.description: This route redirects to the Lessons page (generated lessons are shown in the Lesson Library).
features.howToUse: If you land here, you’ll be sent to /facilitator/lessons.

features.title: Mr. Mentor (/facilitator/mr-mentor)
features.description: Mr. Mentor is the facilitator-facing assistant experience. It opens the counselor client UI used for chat, actions, and deterministic describe/report behaviors.
features.howToUse: Ask questions about facilitator tools, learner planning, and lessons. Use ‘what is …’ for explanations and ‘show my …’ for report-style readouts when supported.

features.title: Notifications (/facilitator/notifications)
features.description: Notifications shows facilitator alerts and lets you configure what types of notifications are enabled.
features.howToUse: Use Refresh to reload. Click the settings button to open Notification Settings and toggle global enable/disable plus specific types. Use the read/unread control on each item to mark it read or unread.

features.title: Hotkeys (/facilitator/hotkeys)
features.description: Hotkeys lets you customize keyboard shortcuts used in facilitator workflows. Settings save locally and (when possible) to your account.
features.howToUse: Use the Hotkeys Manager UI to edit shortcut mappings and save changes.

features.title: Onboarding Video Gate (/facilitator/onboarding/video)
features.description: This onboarding step shows a required signup video gate for facilitators.
features.howToUse: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the video gate.

features.title: Onboarding Tutorial (/facilitator/onboarding/tutorial)
features.description: This onboarding step runs the interactive facilitator tutorial/walkthrough.
features.howToUse: Follow the tutorial prompts to learn the facilitator workflow.

features.title: Post-Lesson Survey (/facilitator/survey)
features.description: This page displays the post-lesson survey UI.
features.howToUse: Fill out the survey after a lesson to provide feedback.
